Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: labrador snout
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: The forever smiling snout of a labrador.

values.description: A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a labrador. [PAWN_possessive] teeth are pointed to suit; speaking is difficult outside of barks and whines, but eating is easier.
A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a labrador. [PAWN_possessive] teeth are pointed to suit, making eating easier. Adaptation has removed some of the difficulty with speaking.

Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: labrador ear
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: A floppy canine ear that wobbles all over the place.

Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: labrador tail
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: The briskly wagging, excitable tail of a labrador retriever.
